Didn't Micah Potter play well? Watch someone pick him up

You don't even know, we were down by like 15 at 5 minutes left. The starters couldn't buy a bucket all game. Put in the garbage time lineup and they go on a 13-0 run to go up by 1. Micah Potter (PF) got the winning block on the next play on the other end.  Final few minutes were hype as hell.
Finals Winner: Heat  Finals MVP: Jimmy Butler  MVP: Jimmy Butler   DPOY: Bam Adebayo  ROY: Micah Potter  MIP: Tyler Herro
